name: Multiplayer Car Crash 2018
description:
Now you can play this extreme car crash mania game with your friends sitting in different parts of the world, or with any stranger online to have some quality fun time. You can make your own server sitting in one room (not visible to other players over the network), and challenge each other by playing in multiplayer car crash mode. There are these lightning rapid fast SUV chasing you from all directions trying to smash you out of the cars arena, so stay focused, and keep a close eye on all the multi player 4x4 vehicles.
While playing this multiplayer 4x4 crash game, you can also try our chase mode, trying to follow this big boss vehicle and don’t let him drive by himself in this insane world, keep enjoying the don’t die crazy car destruction mode, while you are waiting for your mates to join in for a challenge game. Please don’t forget to play the challenge mode, has lots of crazy stunts waiting for you in each level.
This 3D car smash racing simulator can only be made better, while you keep on giving us your feedback, and we promise to fix them ASAP to keep the demolition driving race alive.

Features:
Lots of SUV to choose from
Play multiplayer online or privately with your mates
Keep texting each other while you playing
Lots of modes to choose from.
Be a crazy derby driver for a day
